developer.title: Developer Application
developer.introSubtitle: Transform Your AI Agent Ideas into Production Reality
developer.introDescription: 2025 marks the explosive year for AI agent applications. LegionSpace provides you with a one-stop development platform, transforming you from a bystander to a creator of next-generation digital life and economy.
developer.buildEcosystem: Build Agent Ecosystem, Bring Digital Value Revolution
developer.redefineAI: Redefining the Construction and Evolution of AI Agents
developer.featureEasyDesc: From idea to running agent in just four steps: Create → Equip → Orchestrate → List & Publish
developer.featureExtensibleDesc: Break the capability boundaries of agents. Deep integration with open protocols like MCP allows your agents to safely and seamlessly call massive external tools and data sources like using 'standard components'
developer.featureDeployDesc: Support one-click publishing of agents to Telegram, Discord, Web, and mainstream office platforms, truly achieving 'develop and go live', zero-cost reach to global users.

agentMarket.title: Plugin Marketplace
agentMarket.description: The Marketplace is the neural network of the agent economy, reducing Agent construction costs, enabling developers to focus on creating business value, and forming an open value exchange network through market-based interactions

agentOrchestration.title: Agent Orchestration
agentOrchestration.description: Through neural network collaborative management, the intelligent digital twin system simulates the evolution direction of Agent clusters under different incentive strategies, achieving human-machine symbiosis, algorithm-driven, and ecological autonomy

video.video-subtitle: Learn about our product features and usage methods

knowledge.title: Knowledge Base
knowledge.createKnowledgeBaseDesc: Import your own text data, providing power for your AI tasks
knowledge.dragOrSelectFile: Drag file here, or select file
knowledge.supportedFormats: Supported formats: TXT, MARKDOWN, MDX, PDF, HTML, XLSX, XLS, DOCX, CSV, VTT, PROPERTIES, MD, HTM, maximum capacity 20MB
knowledge.allDocumentsDesc: All documents in the knowledge base
knowledge.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete knowledge base "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.
knowledge.introSubtitle: Here, you can easily organize, store and share your knowledge and inspiration
knowledge.introDescription: The large group space has powerful knowledge base functions, supporting the creation and management of multiple knowledge bases, which can be clearly classified by project, topic, and other dimensions; compatible with various content formats such as articles, notes, and external links, it can completely retain various inspirations and ideas. It ensures permanent storage of knowledge and supports cross-device access and editing, achieving seamless connection.
knowledge.deleteConfirm1: Are you sure you want to delete this document? This action cannot be undone.
knowledge.batchDeleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} selected files? This action cannot be undone.

purchaseNotice.title: Purchase Notice
purchaseNotice.intro: Resource point add-on packages are designed to provide additional resource usage quota within your current plan period:
points: After successful purchase, resource points will take effect immediately and be added to your current plan's remaining resource points for immediate use;
Each add-on package has an independent validity period that will not change with your main plan cycle;
To maximize resource utilization, the system will prioritize consuming resource points with shorter validity periods (e.g., prioritize consuming add-on package points that are about to expire);

Purchasing resource point add-on packages will not change your current main plan's expiration date or start a new plan cycle. Unused add-on resource points will be automatically cleared at the end of their validity period.

payment.title: Package
payment.subtitle: Package
payment.purchaseResourcesNoticeContent: Purchased resource points will be added to your current account and remain valid for the same period as your current plan. Resource points can be used to call agents, knowledge bases and other services.
payment.cannotDowngradeDesc: Enterprise plan users cannot subscribe to this plan
payment.agreementTip: Please agree to the service agreement
payment.scanQrCode: Scan the QR code to complete the payment

purchaseNotice.title: Purchase Notice
purchaseNotice.content: Packages only support upgrades, not downgrades. The new package period will start from the upgrade date. At the same time, you will retain the remaining resource points from the original package and obtain all resource points from the new package.

publishAgent.desc: Publish agents to external platforms such as Telegram, Discord, etc.

listAgent.desc: List the agent on the LegionSpace marketplace

resetCycle.desc: Resource points are reset monthly (Personal edition provides one-time points that do not reset)

resetTime.desc: Resource points are automatically reset on the monthly [Renewal/Purchase] date

advancedCarryOver.desc: Advanced Edition: Unused resource points from the current month will not automatically carry over to the next cycle. Remaining points from the previous month will be cleared when reset.

enterpriseCarryOver.desc: For [Enterprise Edition] only: Considering the special needs of enterprise users, unused resource points from the current month can be carried over to the next month at most. Once the resource points are reset in the next month, all remaining points from the previous month (whether used or not) will be cleared.

filters.endDateBeforeStart: End date cannot be earlier than start date

docs.title: Documentation
docs.title3: Quickly get started with the development of LegionSpace, including environment configuration, project structure, and basic concepts.
docs.welcome: Welcome to LegionSpace development documentation. Here you'll find all the development resources, guides, and sample code you need.

descriptions.getting-started: Quick start with LegionSpace development, including environment setup, project structure, and basic concepts.
descriptions.agent: Learn about various agent use cases and implementation examples, including legal, customer service, sales, and other professional agents.
descriptions.agentmanager: Learn how to create, manage, and optimize agents to improve their performance and effectiveness.
descriptions.knowledge: Master the creation and use of knowledge bases to provide accurate knowledge support for agents.
descriptions.publish: Learn how to publish agents to various platforms, including Telegram, Discord, Slack, and more.
descriptions.api: Detailed API documentation to help you understand the usage of various modules and components.

docs.notFound: Can't find what you're looking for?
docs.contactTeam: If you have any questions or suggestions, please contact the development team

agent.shareChat: This is a shared conversation, no chat history

agent.salesDesc: Sales Agent - Facilitating the intelligence of the entire sales process
agent.salesIntro: I'm Midas! I accurately capture potential business opportunities and automatically generate customer follow-up records, making your sales process efficient and closed-loop. Leave the tasks to me, and you can just focus on communication and closing deals!
agent.serviceDesc: Customer Service Agent - Respond efficiently and enhance the service experience
agent.serviceIntro: I'm DailyAgent! Help managers to real-time grasp project dynamics, employees to efficiently synchronize work results, and achieve 'work tracking, progress control, and collaborative efficiency enhancement'.
agent.messageToMidas: Send a message to the Midas
